telegramR 0.0.1

Export State Class

ExportState.Rd

This class manages the state of exported MTProto senders, including tracking the number of borrowed senders and the time since the last borrowed sender was returned.

Details

Tracks the state of exported MTProto senders

Methods

  • ExportState$new()

Check if the sender should be disconnected

Usage

ExportState$should_disconnect()

Returns

TRUE if should disconnect, FALSE otherwise.

Check if the sender needs to connect

Usage

Returns

TRUE if needs to connect, FALSE otherwise.
